BR.name: Hakuoki: Memories of the Shinsengumi
BR.description: Hakuoki: Memórias do Shinsengumi inclui novos conteúdos história, e dá aos jogadores a chance de tirar uma foto com seus personagens favoritos de Hakuoki! Numa altura em que as forças do xogunato e imperial entraram em confronto pela supremacia sobre o Japão, Chizuru viaja para Kyoto em busca de seu pai desaparecido. Ela corre para o Shinsengumi, um grupo de guerreiros samurais que juraram proteger o shogun. Chizuru descobre que eles também estão à procura de seu pai. Sua jornada se torna mais complexa à medida que enfrentar soldados imperiais e do sobrenatural! Mas no meio de toda essa loucura, vai Chizuru inocente encontrar o amor?

CA.name: Hakuoki: Memories of the Shinsengumi
CA.description: Hakuoki: Memories of the Shinsengumi includes new story content, and gives players the chance to take a photo with their favorite characters from Hakuoki! At a time when shogunate and imperial forces clashed for supremacy over Japan, Chizuru travels to Kyoto in search of her missing father. She runs into the Shinsengumi, a band of samurai warriors sworn to protect the shogun. Chizuru learns that they are also looking for her father. Their journey becomes more complex as they face off against imperial soldiers and the supernatural! But in the midst of all this madness, will innocent Chizuru find love?

MX.name: Hakuoki: Memories of the Shinsengumi
MX.description: Hakuoki: Memorias del Shinsengumi incluye nuevo contenido de la historia, y da a los jugadores la oportunidad de tomar una foto con sus personajes favoritos de Hakuoki! En momentos en que las fuerzas del shogunato e imperiales se enfrentaron por la supremacía sobre Japón, Chizuru viaja a Kyoto en busca de su padre desaparecido. Ella se encuentra con el Shinsengumi, una banda de guerreros samurai jurado proteger el shogun. Chizuru se entera de que también están en busca de su padre. Su viaje se vuelve más compleja, ya que se enfrentan contra soldados imperiales y lo sobrenatural! Pero en medio de toda esta locura, se Chizuru inocente encontrar el amor?

US.description: Hakuoki: Memories of the Shinsengumi includes new story content, and gives players the chance to take a photo with their favorite characters from Hakuoki! At a time when shogunate and imperial forces clashed for supremacy over Japan, Chizuru travels to Kyoto in search of her missing father. She runs into the Shinsengumi, a band of samurai warriors sworn to protect the shogun. Chizuru learns that they are also looking for her father. Their journey becomes more complex as they face off against imperial soldiers and the supernatural! But in the midst of all this madness, will innocent Chizuru find love?
